team.name: Izzy Salas

team.bio: Why do Americans have so many different types of towels? We have beach towels, hand towels, bath towels, dish towels, camping towels, quick-dry towels, and letâ€™s not forget paper towels. Would 1 type of towel work for each of these things?.

team.name: Justine Estrada
team.bio: The red line moved across the page. With each millimeter it advanced forward, something changed in the room. The actual change taking place was difficult to perceive, but the change was real. The red line continued relentlessly across the page and the room would never be the same.
